name: Vince Holding Corp.
description: Vince Holding Corp. is a leading contemporary fashion brand known for its timeless style, luxurious fabrics, and casual sophistication. Founded in 2002, Vince creates essential wardrobe pieces that embody a relaxed yet refined aesthetic. The company's offerings include a wide range of products for men and women, including apparel, footwear, and accessories, all designed with a focus on quality craftsmanship and modern design. Vince operates both wholesale and direct-to-consumer channels, with a growing presence in e-commerce and brick-and-mortar retail locations across the United States and internationally. The brand is recognized for its commitment to sustainability and ethical production practices, ensuring that its operations are environmentally responsible. Vince seeks to provide customers with versatile pieces that can easily transition from day to night, embodying a lifestyle that values comfort and style. The company continues to innovate and expand its product lines while maintaining its dedication to high-quality materials and craftsmanship, making it a beloved choice among fashion-forward consumers.

key_executives.name: Michael A. D. D. M. K. C. G. A. P. P. W. C. C.

seo.meta_title: Vince Holding Corp. | Contemporary Fashion Brand
seo.meta_description: Explore Vince Holding Corp., a leader in contemporary fashion known for its luxurious fabrics and timeless style. Discover our collections for men and women.

faq.question: What types of products does Vince offer?
faq.answer: Vince offers a range of products including apparel, footwear, and accessories for men and women.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Vince?
faq.answer: Brendan Hoffman is the CEO of Vince Holding Corp.

faq.question: Where is Vince headquartered?
faq.answer: Vince is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.

faq.question: What is Vince known for?
faq.answer: Vince is known for its contemporary fashion that combines luxury with everyday wearability.
